text: Brian Cummings (born March 4, 1948) is an American voice actor. He is known for his work on G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero, DuckTales and Beauty and the Beast. == Other websites == * Official website - Voiceatility.com * Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from South Dakota Category:People from Sioux Falls, South Dakota Category:American voice actors
title: Brian Cummings
